attributes.additional_details:
We are all bombarded with telephone calls from numbers which do not seem to exist, some down right criminal in intent, others just annoying.
One thing all have in common is that TPS makes no difference and that BT routing still allows the calls to pass through and presumably profit from them.
All calls made from a non existant or illegal number should not be allowed to pass through the system, BT should be held liable when such calls are allowed to pass through their system.
